DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: Wait a bit, do you even know what you're doing?

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: Or rather, where do you do it?

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: This world does not belong to you, I am the Inception of everything that you see.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: However, if you don't want to leave this place, then we can make a deal.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: It won't be a problem for you to create a farm, will it?

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: Then you'll grow quite a bit of wheat. About 30 pieces.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I expect results from you by the next day. Don't let me down.
